msContents.summary: This is a collection of different worships of lord Śiva. As the left margins indicates Pradoṣa worship, practicing worship on Monday etc. On 4r names of the God śiva are written in columns.

msItem.title: Śivapūjāvidhānasaṃgraha
msItem.incipit:
1v 1 saiktaṃ taṇḍulaścaiva ?? muñjagomayantathā navanitañca rudrakṣaviṣṭaṃ candanagurvakaṃ puṣpamālāgulaṃ bhasma
2r 5 mevāpnotyanuttamaṃ.
2v left margin somavārākyaṃ
2v 1 śivo rudro paśupatiḥ nīlakaṇṭho maheśvaraḥ harikeśavirupākṣavitākṣītripurāntakaḥ śaṃbhuśūlimahādevo namo 2v 2 taṃ pūjayet guruḥ . 2v 7 ca muniśivasaṃpūrṇaṃ dvitīyakṣayakāminī amāvāsye tu ye jñeya sā bodhanāya ?yo
(5 unclear syllables) dvādaśanāmam is written in the left margin on 3r. 3r 1 prathamaṃ tu mahahAdevaṃ dvitīyantu maheśvaraḥ . tṛtīyaṃ śaṃkaraṃ proktaṃ caturthaṃ vṛṣabhadvajaṃ pañcamaṃ 3r 2 śūlapāṇīñca ṣaṣṭhaṃ kāmāṅganāśanaṃ 3r 4 māni mahādevo prakīrtitāḥ ..
oṃ haumādhāraśakte namaḥ . oṃ hāmeśvaryāya namaḥ iśāne oṃ hāṃ kaṇṭhikāyai namaḥ 3v 7 oṃ hāṃ vairāgyāya namaḥ o hā mathaścadanāya namaḥ oṃ hāṃ kesarebhyo namaḥ oṃ hauṃ rodryai namaḥ oṃ rodryai namaḥ
4r 1 oṃ hāṃ kālai namaḥ oṃ hāṃ manonmanyai namaḥ viṣṇave namaḥ iśvarāya namaḥ 4r 3 oṃ hoṃ haṃ hāṃ śivāya namaḥ
4r 6 oṃ hāṃ sarvabhutadamanyai namaḥ . oṃ hāṃ somamaṇḍalāliptaye oṃ hāṃ śaktimaṇḍalāliptaye 4v 1 śa tat umāṃ uvāca somavārasya māhātmyaṃ kathayasva mamātra kiṃ kāryaṃ kiṃ phalaṃ nṛṇāṃ (gap of aproximately 2 syllables as space is left blank) rva maheśataḥ . śrīnandikeśvara uvāca sa 4v 2 pṛṣṭopyāha caiyam marma somavāraṃ mahāphalaṃ tuṣṭikaraṃ sa mat śivasālokyadāyakaṃ 2 mayā sahito devassoma ityadhiyayate
msItem.explicit:
(25r) 45r 3 somavārakathā yatra tatrastho bhagavān śivaḥ iti bhaviṣyottarapurāṇe gautamasarvaṛṣi saṃvāde navasomavāravratamā (25r) 45r 4 hātmyannāma caturcatvārīṃsodhyāyaḥ … vindhya? ṅagari 20?
(25v) [45v] 1 udyāpanena (gap of 1 syllable due to worm eaten folio.) hi tat vilipyat vijatāraṃ tat rātraṃ ?? śrīmam tra tāraḥ (2 syllables crossed out.) kāśyapagotrodbhava kāśyāyanasūtronuṣṭhānake (25v) [45v]2 na śrīnivāsena idaṃ somavāravratodyāpanamalekhitam . śrīmatṣaṇmukhassvahāya namaḥ āna??śvo nama? 212 (25v) [45v] 3 śubhamastu śivo rudraḥ paśupatiḥ nilakaṇṭhomaheśvaraḥ harikeśaḥ virūpākṣaḥ pinākī (25v) [45v] 4 tripurantakah śaśaṃ? śulī mahādevaṃ namonama prajayet guruḥ
